name: Follow Me (truearogog)
description:
Four buddies trying to escape the construction zone.
They are a bit slow on understanding but their mental connection is indestructible.

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys - move around
Space - mind stopping (what does it even mean?)
It's preferable to play on fullscreen. ;)

Credits:
Programming - Artyom Strelkov (truearogog)
Art - Artyom Volchkov (0bl4chko)
Music - www.bensound.com

Made during GMTK Game Jam 2021.
